duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and accountable for the total operation of a store ensuring maximum sales and profitability.
Control expenses, shrink, inventory control, and staffing.
Ensure Guest Services are established and maintained.
Manage setup, pack-up, and teardown of a seasonal store.

education_certification.credential: Prior retail management experience is required.
Physical demands include 8+ hours of standing/walking, climbing ladders, setting up fixtures, and lifting/moving up to 50 pounds.
